name: react-querybuilder
description: The React <QueryBuilder /> component for constructing queries

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:css && npm run build:types && npm run build:formatQuery && npm run build:parseSQL
scripts.build:css: sass --no-source-map src/query-builder.scss dist/query-builder.css && copyfiles -f src/query-builder.scss dist
scripts.build:types: copyfiles -f src/types/{props,validation}.ts src/types/pre4.5 && replace './basic' '../basic' src/types/pre4.5/props.ts --silent && replace '\/\* begin temp' '/* begin temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && replace 'end temp \*\/' '/* end temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json --emitDeclarationOnly && replace 'import type' 'import' ./dist/types -r --silent && replace '\/\* begin temp \*\/' '/* begin temp' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && replace '\/\* end temp \*\/' 'end temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && rimraf src/types/pre4.5/{props,validation}.ts
scripts.generate-sqlparser: npx jison src/utils/parseSQL/sql.jison --outfile src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js --module-type commonjs && npx jscodeshift -t src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.codemod.js src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js && echo "\nexport default sqlParser;" >> src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js
